pyEchosign.classes package¶

Submodules¶

pyEchosign.classes.account module¶

class pyEchosign.classes.account.EchosignAccount(access_token: str, **kwargs)¶

Bases: object

Saves OAuth Information for connecting to Echosign :param access_token = The OAuth Access token to use for authenticating to Echosign:

Keyword Arguments:
 
  • user_id – The ID of the user to specify as the API caller, if not provided the caller is inferred from the token
  • user_email – The email of the user to specify as the API caller, if not provided the caller is inferred from the token
access_token = None¶

class pyEchosign.classes.documents.FileInfo(*args, **kwargs)¶

Bases: object

Used with DocumentCreationInfo to specify which documents should be used in an agreement. One of the following arguments must be provided.

library_document_id¶

“The ID for a library document that is available to the sender”

library_document_name¶

“The name of a library document that is available to the sender”

transient_document¶

A TransientDocument (or ID) to use in the agreement

library_document_id = None
library_document_name = None
transient_document = None
web_file = None¶
